document.title: 3S-Smart Software Solutions GmbH CODESYS Web Server

revision_history.summary: ICSA-17-087-02 3S-Smart Software Solutions GmbH CODESYS Web Server

product.name: CODESYS Web Server: Versions 2.3 and prior

cwe.name: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type

notes.text: A specially crafted web server request may allow the upload of arbitrary files to the CODESYS Web Server without authorization which may allow remote code execution.CVE-2017-6027 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 9.8 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

notes.text: A malicious user could overflow the stack buffer by providing overly long strings to functions that handle the XML. Because the function does not verify string size before copying to memory, the attacker may then be able to crash the application or run arbitrary code.CVE-2017-6025 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 9.8 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
